name: Credential Leak Monitoring
description: Monitoring for leaked credentials and mitigating the associated risks to improve organizational security posture.

techniques.comment: Stolen credentials could be leveraged to use valid accounts for unauthorized access.
Phishing may be a method through which credentials are harvested.
Monitoring for credential leaks suggests the possibility of detecting or responding to credential dumping incidents.
API keys mentioned as part of sensitive information, hinting at misuse of API credentials as a TTP.
Refers to the data compromise which could happen as a result of credentials being stolen from repositories.
Credential leak monitoring automates the detection of leaked information.
Leaked credentials found on the dark web might be exfiltrated using web services.
Refers to potential data theft that could occur following a breach that leverages stolen credentials.
Discusses improving the security posture, which might include detecting attempts to evade or disable security software.
Attackers might perform account discovery after gaining access with stolen credentials to understand the environment better.
The comment on addressing vulnerabilities could imply removing indicators of compromise to maintain a stronger security posture.
